QuestData.Title: The Late Mrs. Muskpaw
QuestData.Description: This well worn trinket has several markings on it confessing love and adoration from the late Mrs. Muskpaw.$b$bPerhaps Lao would like his wife's trinket back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Muskpaw Keepsake to Lao Muskpaw.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh, and what have you there.
QuestData.RewardText: Ya never know how much you can lose until you've lost it. My wife passed a few seasons ago, but I can tell you this is a day when I could use her smile the most.$b$bAt least she doesn't have to see what these yaungol did to her beloved ranch.
